Modular Design - Designing the sleeping bag to be modular, allowing users to customize the shape, size, and number of compartments to better suit their individual needs.
Insect Repellent Fabric - Incorporating insect-repellent fabric into the sleeping bag to protect the user from bugs and ensure a bug-free sleeping experience.

Integrated Pillow System - Designing a sleeping bag that includes an integrated pillow feature, eliminating the need for a separate pillow and providing a more integrated and comfortable sleep experience.
Portable Charging Station - Including a built-in portable charging station within the sleeping bag, allowing users to charge their devices while on the go.
Hydropower Generation - Having the sleeping bag generate hydroelectric power through the body heat of the sleeper, providing an eco-friendly way to stay charged while camping.
